results.title: Toyota : Alex 'Jezza' Jesaulenko [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
Stephen Curry and Dave Lawson, with the help of Alex Jesaulenko, relive ‘Jezza’s‘ high flying mark during the 1970 VFL Grand Final.
Produced by Mojo MDA.

results.title: Toyota : Francis Bourke [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
Stephen Curry and Dave Lawson, with the help of Francis Bourke, relive Bourke’s courageous goal after a heavy collision during the 1980 home and away VFL season.
Produced by Mojo MDA.

results.title: Channel Seven Sport : Up There Cazaly [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
A television commercial for Channel Seven Sport’s coverage of Australian Rules Football, using the song ‘Up There Cazaly’ written by Mike Brady and Peter Sullivan. The song was inspired by the high flying marks of Roy Cazaly who played during the 1920s. The commercial shows some spectacular high marks and bruising bumps.
Produced by Campaign Palace.

results.title: Holeproof Computer Socks [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
A commercial for Holeproof ‘Computer Socks’ set in a patent office, where the inventor’s glee at his discovery (‘they fall up, not down’) causes Isaac Newton to rethink his theory of gravity.
Produced by Campaign Palace.
